text: fa'iin kadhabk -'ayaha alrusula- mukhalifuk min almushrikin walyahudi, waghayrahima, faqul lahuma: rabukum jlun waelana dhu rahmat waseatan, wala yudfe eiqabah ean alqawm aladhin 'ajramuu, faktasibuu aldhunuba, wajtarahuu alsayyaata. wafi hdha tahdid lahum limukhalafatihim alrasul salaa allah ealayh wasalam
